name: Outro
_source: speak;Sages;Ok, pops. You better tell me what's up.
speak;Sages14;I feel you ought to... *COUGH*|Urk... be more responsible.
speak;Sal;I'm sure that you understand our concerns.
speak;Javi;Your Majesty, there appears to be Monsdorian wyverns breaching the perimeter!
speak;Javi;One can only assume King Oberon himself.
speak;Sal;We have to stand our ground, right?
speak;Sages14;I don't know if we can handle their might...
speak;Sages;Pfft! Wyverns are no match for my bow!
speak;Sages14;You would stand no match.|King Oberon of Monsdor, he raised his own siblings.|But, despite being a caring family man, he is fiercely dangerous...
speak;Sal;You suggest we... flee?|But, this is our home!
speak;Sages14;Okay, Sal. You take the boy... and your platoon.|Go through the underground passage...
speak;Javi;I refuse to leave you.|My group will stand strong!|Come!
speak;Sages14;Alright, Javi. I will stand with you...
speak;Sages14;Indeed, though... why?|Why go through such lengths to attack us?|Based on... *COUGH* baseless conjecture?
speak;Oberon;Oh, it appears you're not as sharp as I thought.

speak;Oberon;I do not recall speaking to you.|Now, where was I? Ah, yes. It should be obvious.|Aurelia is powerful, they have plentiful resources.|Resources that my people would appreciate.|I have much to gain by siding with Aurelia...
speak;Oberon;I can't know for certain if you ordered for prince Elias to be killed.|But I'd like to take my chances.|My soul would be cleansed if I resolve this unholy transgression.
speak;Sages14;Why would I want him dead?|Aurelia and Arcei were on peaceful terms!
speak;Oberon;Look. The assassin praised to you.|Clearly you believe yourself as a false God.
speak;Javi;You... You should leave.|Please, we can resolve this without fighting...
speak;Oberon;Well, let's see if you're willing to die for him!
speak;Oberon;Still standing? Impressive.|Most crumble to dust.
speak;Javi;You wondered... if I would die for... King Sages...|I would, in a heartbeat...
speak;Sages14;Javi...|Please, I'll hand myself over to you, after all...|Wouldn't Aurelia want to deal with me personally?
speak;Oberon;I suppose, I would still get credit for bringing you in...
speak;Sages14;I am afraid I have to do this, I'm sorry...
speak;Javi;Put... put the warp staff down...
speak;Sages14;*COUGH* Just... get this over with.|I'll accept anything, so long as my people are safe...
